portfolios.name: O-Present
portfolios.desc: An open source application for web-based online presence needs, with GPS and selfie photo features.
portfolios.tools: MySQL, CodeIgniter 4, Myth/Auth, Tabler.io, jQuery, WebcamJS

portfolios.name: PT. Sumber Multi Era Motor Inventory System
portfolios.desc: An inventory management information system website for PT. Sumber Multi Era Motor, featuring allocation, transfer, sales, and return functionalities, designed for seamless integration across all branches.

portfolios.name: O-Stock
portfolios.desc: A website for goods inventory management, to make it easier to manage stock and sales data in all company branches.

portfolios.name: KopiKing Company Profile
portfolios.desc: A website to display the (fictitious) company profile of Cafe KopiKing is designed to display menu information, vision, customer testimonials, and a contact page. All content can be easily managed through an intuitive administrator interface.

portfolios.name: O-Present Landing Page
portfolios.desc: A landing page for the O-Present Website application with the main aim of directing visitors to download the O-Present application.

portfolios.name: TasteTrack
portfolios.desc: A food recipe website utilizing the OMDB API as its data source, featuring recipe ideas and search functionality.

portfolios.name: Props Construction Company Profile
portfolios.desc: A website to display the (fictitious) Props Construction Company profile with about, services, projects and faq pages.

portfolios.name: Luxury Tailored Landing Page
portfolios.desc: A landing page for the (fictitious) Luxury Tailored Company with the main objective of directing visitors to subscribe to the latest news from Luxury Tailored.
